name: Spicy Keto Chicken-and-Cheese Casserole
author: Soccerchef
summary: Keto-friendly take on chicken enchiladas without the tortillas. This casserole is easily customized by adding any ingredients you have on hand. Hubby loved it as part of our first week of ketogenic recipes. Makes great leftovers for lunch served cold or hot... a win-win! You can also add sliced olives, tomato, and lettuce, if you like.
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into chunks
1 teaspoon taco seasoning mix, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat a pan over medium-high heat
Add chicken and saute until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 6 to 8 minutes
Transfer chicken into the prepared baking pan
Mix salsa, sour cream, and jalapenos together in a bowl and pour over the chicken
Bake in the preheated oven until hot, about 25 minutes
Remove from oven and cover with Cheddar cheese
Continue baking until cheese melts, about 5 minutes more
Let casserole cool before cutting into pieces and garnishing with green onions
